column3: 2014. mario's personality was very loving. he loved being held and cuddled. his favorite things to do were to blow kisses and chase his twin sister around the house. anyone having contact with mario states that his sweet little life touched them in a special way. he leaves to cherish his sweet memory: his mother and father; four siblings
column7: his twin sister myah; grandmother michele adams
column8: uncle marshall adams & great uncle bruce adams. he also leaves his very special godparents kisha and jeff farley. adrian was preceded in death by his baby brother
column9: gabriel. a service was held for him saturday
